author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:

Currectly TreeWriterForEcalCorrection edmplugin is defined in src directory  which means it becomes part of the FastSimulationCalorimetry shared library. Any plugin which depneds on `FastSimulation/Calorimetry` then register `TreeWriterForEcalCorrection` which can result in duplicate plugin definition e.g.

https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/showDupDict.py//slc7_amd64_gcc700/www/sat/11.0-sat-11/CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-08-31-1100/testLogs/dupDict-edmPD.log

- TreeWriterForEcalCorrection:
  - pluginFastSimulationEventProducer.so
  - pluginFastSimulationSimplifiedGeometryPropagatorAuto.so

#### PR validation:

Loval build show no error.
title: move TreeWriterForEcalCorrection in to a plugin directory
